detail_desc: Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist and elasticated hems. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist and elasticated hems. Soft brushed inside.
Captain’s cap in cotton twill with metal buttons at the sides and braiding at the front. Quilted lining.
Jumper in a soft knit with a ribbed polo neck, cable-knit section at the top, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft knit with a ribbed polo neck, cable-knit section at the top, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft knit with a ribbed polo neck, cable-knit section at the top, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Dungarees in soft sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication at the back and adjustable shoulder straps with press-stud fastenings. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Dungarees in soft sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication at the back and adjustable shoulder straps with press-stud fastenings. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Suede boots with pointed toes. Satin linings and leather insoles. Heel 7.5 cm.
Short dress in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves, a V-neck and gathers at the front for a draping effect.
Short dress in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves, a V-neck and gathers at the front for a draping effect.
Blouse in a cotton weave with a round neck and decorative flounces at the top. Small opening and button at the back of the neck and short cap sleeves.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in a checked weave with a concealed zip in one side and an overlocked edge at the hem. Unlined.

Strapless balconette bra in lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Silicone trim at the top of the back, additional support at the sides and front, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. V-shaped back so that the bra can be worn under low-cut garments.

Strapless balconette bra in lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Silicone trim at the top of the back, additional support at the sides and front, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. V-shaped back so that the bra can be worn under low-cut garments.
Jazz trousers in sturdy cotton jersey with wide elastication at the waist.
Long, wide dress in slub-weave cotton with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Gathered seam below the bust and a tiered skirt with a flounced hem.

Ankle-length dungarees in washed, stretch denim with space for a growing tummy. Adjustable straps with metal fasteners, a three-part chest pocket, side pockets, back pockets, buttons at the sides and tapered legs.

Ankle-length dungarees in washed, stretch denim with space for a growing tummy. Adjustable straps with metal fasteners, a three-part chest pocket, side pockets, back pockets, buttons at the sides and tapered legs.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in an airy weave with buttons at the back and narrow shoulder straps with decorative buttons at the front. Elasticated seam at the waist, diagonal side pockets and tapered, 3/4-length legs.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in an airy weave with buttons at the back and narrow shoulder straps with decorative buttons at the front. Elasticated seam at the waist, diagonal side pockets and tapered, 3/4-length legs.
Short pull-on shorts in washed cotton denim with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and scalloped, broderie anglaise hems.
Calf-length dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Seam with pleats at the waist and short sleeves with narrow elastication and gathers. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Seam with pleats at the waist and short sleeves with narrow elastication and gathers. Unlined.

Short, off-the-shoulder dress in an airy, plumeti weave with elastication and a small frill trim at the top. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and a flounce at the hem. Jersey lining.
Ankle boots with a zip at the back. Cotton twill linings and insoles and smooth soles. Heel 6 cm.
Ankle boots with a zip at the back. Cotton twill linings and insoles and smooth soles. Heel 6 cm.
Ankle boots with a zip at the back. Cotton twill linings and insoles and smooth soles. Heel 6 cm.
Ankle boots with a zip at the back. Cotton twill linings and insoles and smooth soles. Heel 6 cm.
Vest top in soft ribbed jersey.

Set with a short-sleeved top and pair of leggings in soft cotton jersey. Top with a print motif and appliqués on the front and a concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Patterned trousers with an elasticated waist.
Block-coloured top in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves and a chest pocket with a decorative button. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Block-coloured top in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves and a chest pocket with a decorative button. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.

Shirt in washed cotton denim with a collar and flounced trim around the yoke and shoulders. Press-studs down the front and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Gently rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Cycling shorts in ribbed jersey with an elasticated waist.

Knee-length, double-breasted coat woven in a wool blend with wide notch lapels and long raglan sleeves. Large patch front pockets, one inner pocket and a single back vent. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.

Knee-length, double-breasted coat woven in a wool blend with wide notch lapels and long raglan sleeves. Large patch front pockets, one inner pocket and a single back vent. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.

Knee-length, double-breasted coat woven in a wool blend with wide notch lapels and long raglan sleeves. Large patch front pockets, one inner pocket and a single back vent. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.

Set with a dungaree dress and top in soft cotton. Dress in slightly stretchy narrow-wale corduroy with straps, a flounced trim at the top and metal press-studs at the back. Unlined. Long-sleeved top in patterned jersey.

Straight-cut coat woven in a wool blend with narrow notch lapels, buttons down the front and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Decorative chest pocket, welt front pockets with a flap, one inner pocket and a single back vent. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.
Long, double-breasted coat in a woven wool blend with notch lapels. Side pockets with a fake flap, an inner pocket, a tie belt and a single back vent. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.
Wide resin bangle. Width 4 cm.
Short, A-line skirt in a textured weave with a high waist, concealed zip at the back and decorative metal buckles at the front. Lined.
Short corduroy skirt with a zip fly and button, pleats at the front, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Short corduroy skirt with a zip fly and button, pleats at the front, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front and patch front pockets. Ribbing down the button band and around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, patterned cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and frill-trimmed elastication at the top, both front and back.
Body in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a V-neck front and back, tie-top shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.

Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in sturdy felted fabric with large notch lapels, dropped shoulders and wide, gently tapered sleeves. Diagonal pockets at the front and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Jumper knitted in soft cashmere with a round neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper knitted in soft cashmere with a round neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper knitted in soft cashmere with a round neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit lambswool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit lambswool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit lambswool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit lambswool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jacket in soft fleece with a stand-up collar, fleece-lined hood and a yoke in woven fabric. Zip down the front with a chin guard and a zipped front pocket. Rounded and longer at the back.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Sleeveless top in a soft knit with a V-neck front and back and a roll-edge hem.
Long-sleeved cardigan in soft, fine-knit lambswool with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, discreet pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved cardigan in soft, fine-knit lambswool with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, discreet pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Pyjamas with a shirt and shorts in soft cotton jersey. Shirt with rounded notch lapels, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Shorts with an elasticated waist and overlocked hems.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in a patterned crêpe weave with smocking and a small frill trim at the top and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves. Seam and a wide flounce at the hem.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in a patterned crêpe weave with smocking and a small frill trim at the top and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves. Seam and a wide flounce at the hem.

Blouse in a soft cotton weave with a small stand-up collar, V-neck and buttons down the front. Narrow, detachable ties under the bust, 3/4-length raglan sleeves, narrow cuffs with ties, and a rounded hem.

Padded, knee-length jacket in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Hood with an elasticated drawstring, zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, concealed side pockets with a zip, and long raglan sleeves. The filling is made from recycled polyester.

Padded, knee-length jacket in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Hood with an elasticated drawstring, zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, concealed side pockets with a zip, and long raglan sleeves. The filling is made from recycled polyester.

Knee-length coat in woven fabric with a filling of 70% recycled down and 30% recycled feathers. High collar, concealed press-studs down the front, welt side pockets and a detachable, elasticated belt with a large plastic buckle at the waist. Lined. The polyester content of the coat is recycled.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a round neck and buttons down the front.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a round neck and buttons down the front.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a round neck and buttons down the front.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a round neck and buttons down the front.
Pyjamas in soft, patterned jersey made from a cotton blend. Longer-style top with a soft brushed inside and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of leggings in soft organic cotton. Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and appliqués on the front, a concealed press-stud on each shoulder and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Jersey leggings with an elasticated waist.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of leggings in soft organic cotton. Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and appliqués on the front, a concealed press-stud on each shoulder and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Jersey leggings with an elasticated waist.
Straight, fine-knit cardigan in a soft merino wool blend with a zip down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Oversized jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
